titles.title: Bipartisan Panel to Design Long-Range Social Security Reform Act of 1998
To establish the Bipartisan Panel to Design Long-Range Social Security Reform.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 1/27/1998--Introduced. Bipartisan Panel to Design Long-Range Social Security Reform Act of 1998 - Establishes the Bipartisan Panel to Design Long-Range Social Security Reform to design a single set of legislative and administrative recommendations for long-range reforms for restoring the solvency of the social security system and maintaining retirement income security in the United States. Authorizes appropriations.
